content: if you release the gauge holding the point which is midway along the twisted strands in one hand bring the knotted end and the anchored end together and then flick them letting go of the midway point at the same time the yarn will twist together don t let the other ends go until you have tied them together with an overhand knot trim ends smooth out any uneven twists thread unknotted end through loops at each ridge as in pic a crochet hook is useful for this knot and trim this end once in place or cut 2 narrow ribbons each 40 cms 16 long bitsa bootees 4
